performance-warning.title: Warning
performance-warning.text: Searching using the following filter(s) may take a long time. Do you want to proceed?

file.input.description: Choose the file you would like to import with the format: Excel or CSV

validation.file.empty: Wrong name for Observation sheet or the file has no data. Please verify and try again
validation.extensions: Only the following file extensions are allowed: {{param}}
validation.entryNo.format: Some ENTRY_NO values are not a positive integer. Please correct them and try again
validation.entryNo.duplicates: Some ENTRY_NO values are duplicated. Please correct them and try again
validation.guid.duplicates: Some GUID values are duplicated. Please correct them and try again
validation.amount.format: Some AMOUNT values are not numeric. Please correct them and try again
validation.names.no.column: No suitable column found for gemrplasm name. Please check the CODES sheet for NAMES
validation.names.missing.data: There are some records with no values for any of the available NAME columns (entry_no: {{param}}). Please correct them and try again

basicDetails.description: The following mandatory basic details are not described for all or some of the germplasm records. Please define the value to assign to these records.
